mastermold.notes: AC 12, adaptive resistance, after each player take 1 action(create miner, direct miner, detonate miner (DC 16 dex or 5d6 fire damage), heat up (1D6 fire damage per stack))

miner.notes: AC 16, adaptive resistance that of mastermold, 2 +8 drill 2d6+4, charge launcher 2d6 in 5ft spread
